title: Full Metal Jayce Skin Bug
body: I've been playing full metal Jayce and when 5.22 came out the robot voiceover changed back to the classic voiceover. Please fix this Jayce is my main.           {{item:2050}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Heya **The Mez Meister**,

While we do appreciate you taking your time to report a bug here in the Help and Support boards, you'll likely want to report bugs in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards to gain more visibility from the relevant Riot staff!
